Interface ConvertStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
SingleBit, SingleChannel, ThreeChannel
public interface ConvertStrategy
Interface for defining color conversion strategies. Provides methods to convert between different channel formats and ARGB.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    ArgbToOriginal(long pixel)
    Converts a pixel value from ARGB back to its original format.
    long
    toArgb(long pixel)
    Converts a pixel value from its original format to ARGB.

  • Method Details

    • toArgb

      long toArgb(long pixel)
      Converts a pixel value from its original format to ARGB.
      Parameters:
      pixel - the original pixel value
      Returns:
      the pixel value in ARGB format

    • ArgbToOriginal

      long ArgbToOriginal(long pixel)
      Converts a pixel value from ARGB back to its original format.
      Parameters:
      pixel - the pixel value in ARGB format
      Returns:
      the pixel value in the original format
